Key Match Events: Jacob Stallings' RBI double in the ninth inning
Pre-Game Insights: Rockies were on an 11-day road trip facing playoff-bound teams
Tigers were three games behind in the wild-card race with ace Tarik Skubal on the mound
Post-Match Reflections: Rockies manager Bud Black highlighted the win as significant
Tigers manager A.J. Hinch acknowledged the team's offensive issues
Skubal remained in the game despite being hit by a line drive
Miscellaneous Highlights: Game was part of a nine-game series
Tigers' Skubal had a strong performance despite the loss
Rockies' young players contributed to the win
Others: The game was a key moment in the Tigers' and Rockies' seasons
